pkgmetadata.longdescription: Thurstonian Models for Sensory Discrimination // Provides methods for sensory discrimination methods; duotrio, tetrad, triangle, 2-AFC, 3-AFC, A-not A, same-different, 2-AC and degree-of- difference. This enables the calculation of d-primes, standard errors of d-primes, sample size and power computations, and comparisons of different d-primes. Methods for profile likelihood confidence intervals and plotting are included.
